// src/pages/Articles.js import { useState } from "react" import '../App.css'; function scrollToExperience(id) { const element = document.getElementById(id); if (element) { element.scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth", block: "start" }); element.classList.add("highlight"); setTimeout(() => element.classList.remove("highlight"), 2000); } } // –ú–∞–ø–ø–∏–Ω–≥ —Å–∫–∏–ª–ª–æ–≤ -> –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ã const skillMap = { Python: ["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep"], Bash: ["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep", "murex"], Selenium: ["web-app", "beep"], Cypress:["web-app"], Playwright:["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep"], Robot_Framework:["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep"], Appium:["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep"], JMeter:["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep"], OKTET_Labs_TE:["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep"], Applitools:["oktet-te", "web-app", "beep"], TestLink:["web-app"], }; const projects = { "oktet-te": { title: "OKTET Labs Test Environment (2015‚Äì2016)", }, "playwright": { title: "Remote Flags (2024‚Äì2025)", }, "android": { title: "Beep Player (2023‚ÄìPresent)", }, "murex": { title: "Act Digital ‚Äî Murex (2025 ‚Äî Present)", }, "wifi-mesh": { title: "Tilgin / Seliro WiFi Mesh (2015 ‚Äî 2017)", }, "mptcp": { title: "Intel MPTCP Project (2015 ‚Äî 2023)", }, "teaching": { title: "Rostelecom ‚Äî Granny Online Project (2012 ‚Äî 2014)", } }; function Portfolio() { const [activeSkill, setActiveSkill] = useState(null); //const handleSkillClick = (skill) => { //setActiveSkill(activeSkill === skill ? null : skill); // toggle //}; const handleSkillClick = (group, skill) => { setActiveSkills((prev) => ({ ...prev, [group]: prev[group] === skill ? null : skill, // toggle –≤–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã })); }; // üëá –≤—Å–ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—è –¥–ª—è —Ä–µ–Ω–¥–µ—Ä–∏–Ω–≥–∞ –≥—Ä—É–ø–ø—ã const renderGroup = (groupName, skills) => (

Portfolio

QA Engineer with 10+ years of experience in manual and automated testing,

covering high-performance networking, IoT, mobile, web applications,

fintech, and AI-driven SaaS platforms.

{renderGroup("Testing Tools", [ "Python", "Bash", "Selenium", "Cypress", "Playwright", "Robot_Framework", "Appium", "JMeter", "OKTET_Labs_TE", "Applitools", "TestLink", ])} {renderGroup("Languages", [ "Python", "C", "JavaScript", "TypeScript", "Bash", "HTML", "CSS", "Java", ])} {renderGroup("Special Experience", ["AI", "Murex", "IoT"])} {renderGroup("Monitoring & Analytics", ["ElasticSearch"])}
);

Certification & Education

  • TAU (Test Automation University, Applitools), 2025

    Automation Testing Courses, Performance Testing Course, QA Lead Course

  • INTUIT (Online University), 2024

    Python ‚Äî OOP and Classes

    The Flexible Process Methodology ‚Äî Agile

  • OKTET Labs Internship (2015‚Äì2016)

    Full-time internship with hands-on experience in QA and test development

  • Saint Petersburg State Conservatory, Russia (2008‚Äì2013)

    Master‚Äôs Degree in Piano Performance and Music Theory

Experience

{/* Act Digital */}

QA Automation Engineer

Act Digital (Remote, 2025 ‚Äî Present)

  • Maintained and reorganized test suites for Murex platform in banking domain
  • Collaborated with devs & BAs to ensure compliance with regulations
  • Achievements: Restored 80% of deprecated critical tests, reintegrated into CI/CD (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD)
{/* Remote Flags */}

QA Engineer

Remote Flags (2024 ‚Äî 2025)

  • Tested AI-driven web app (frontend, backend, blockchain wallet, crypto, AI chat)
  • Performed load & concurrency testing for AI personas
  • Achievements: Automated 90% core scenarios (Playwright, Cypress, Postman); reduced CI runtime by 40%
{/* Beep Player */}

QA Lead

Customer Project ‚Äî Beep Player (2023 ‚Äî Present)

  • Owned QA cycle: strategy, planning, regression & release prep for Android app
  • Performed compatibility testing across Android versions
  • Achievements: Built QA process from scratch, ensured 0 critical defects at Google Play launch
{/* Intel MPTCP */}

QA / Integration Engineer

OKTET Labs ‚Äî Intel MPTCP Project (2015 ‚Äî 2023)

  • Developed automated suites for Multipath TCP technology
  • Managed VM-based test environments, traffic shaping, and network emulation
  • Achievements: Reduced manual testing time by 50% with full automation
{/* WiFi Mesh Project */}

QA Engineer

Tilgin / Seliro WiFi Mesh (2015 ‚Äî 2017)

  • Developed and tested WiFi Mesh solutions (DFS, radar detection, regulatory domains)
  • Validated high-concurrency topologies and stability
  • Achievements: Built comprehensive WiFi Mesh test suite, boosted reliability for HKBN launch
{/* Oktet Labs Test Environment */}

QA Engineer

OKTET Labs Test Environment Project (Open Source, 2015 ‚Äî 2016)

  • Extended TE features (remote serial manipulation, L2TP, OpenVPN, hostapd)
  • Maintained open-source test frameworks and contributed patches
  • Achievements: Increased adoption in QA community, improved automation scalability
{/* Teaching / Granny Online */}

Trainer

Rostelecom ‚Äî Granny Online Project (2012 ‚Äî 2014)

  • Taught computer literacy to senior citizens
  • Developed training materials and one-on-one sessions
